snippet.title: Tom Cruise Wouldn't Invite Russell Brand Into Scientology
snippet.description:
Tom Cruise Wouldn't Invite Russell Brand Into Scientology
Toegevoegd door revnewmedia vorig jaar
This is something we haven't heard before: a Scientology member not wanting to recruit a new member! Well, that is exactly what happened with Russell Brand. Poor guy just wanted to join. Even if some people say it is a cult, he wanted in!
50 430 views

snippet.title: Tom Cruise Pulls A Brad Pitt, Surprises Fans
snippet.description:
Tom Cruise Pulls A Brad Pitt, Surprises Fans
Toegevoegd door revnewmedia laatste juli
Tom Cruise pulled a Brad Pitt and surprised his fans. He didn't show up at one of his own movies, but we're guessing he just assumed all the graduates on this day were Tom Cruise fans.

snippet.title: Katie Holmes Left Tom Cruise To Protect Suri From Scientology
snippet.description:
Katie Holmes Left Tom Cruise To Protect Suri From Scientology
Toegevoegd door Splash News laatste november

snippet.title: Tom Cruise Files $50 Million Lawsuit Against Tabloids
snippet.description:
Tom Cruise Files $50 Million Lawsuit Against Tabloids
Toegevoegd door Splash News laatste november
Tom Cruise has reportedly filed a $50 million lawsuit against tabloid magazines that claim he abandoned his daughter Suri.

snippet.title: Tom Cruise has started a search to find a new girlfriend, see who makes the cut!

Toegevoegd door 3 Minute Update laatste september

snippet.title: Oblivion Trailer Italiano - Tom Cruise
snippet.description:
Oblivion Trailer Italiano - Tom Cruise
Toegevoegd door Trailers e Clip in Italiano vorig jaar
Check our Official Website: http://www.acinemanews.comClick to subscribe: http://bit.ly/GFunSgQui troverete Recensioni, Trailer, Interviste, News su Cinema e Spettacolo e molto altro ancora!Oblivion:Release Date: 11/04/2013Genre: Azione, Fantasy, AvventuraCast: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Olga Kurylenko, Zoe Bell, Melissa Leo, Andrea RiseboroughDirectors: Joseph KosinskiStudio: Universal Pictures ItaliaJack è un ex soldato, l'ultimo sopravvissuto sulla Terra, devastata dalla guerra contro una razza aliena. Dopo aver ritrovato un'astronave distrutta, la storia dell'unica superstite al suo interno lo trascina in un' avventura che cambierà per sempre il loro destino. Jack mette in discussione tutto ciò che credeva di sapere sul suo mondo, sulla sua missione e su se stesso. In un inseguimento per terra, aria e spazio. Jack è costretto a un confronto con i suoi superiori per conoscere la verità.Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/filmisnowFollow us on Facebook: http://on.fb.me/UFZaEuUn nuovo trailer ogni giorno!"Oblivion" "Oblivion Trailer" "Oblivion Trailer Ita" "Oblivion Trailer Italiano" "Oblivion Trailer Italiano Tom Cruise" "Oblivion HD" "Tom Cruise" "Morgan Freeman" "Nikolaj Coster-Waldau" "Olga Kurylenko" "Zoe Bell" "Melissa Leo" "Andrea Riseborough" "Joseph Kosinski" "Filmisnow2" "machinima" "coming soon"

snippet.title: Oblivion International Trailer - Tom Cruise
snippet.description:
Oblivion International Trailer - Tom Cruise
Toegevoegd door CINEMA HD Official Movie News Agency vorig jaar
Check our Official Website: http://www.acinemanews.comClick to subscribe: http://bit.ly/GETHadHere you'll find Movie Reviews, Movie Trailers, Celebrity Interviews, Movie and Entertainment News and much more!Oblivion International Trailer - Tom Cruise: While the first domestic trailer won't debut until Sunday, December 9th, the international trailer for Oblivion has arrived, offering quite a look at this sci-fi thriller from Tron: Legacy directorJoseph Kosinski. Based on his original concept, the movie stars Tom Cruise as a scavenger on a post-apocalyptic earth who discovers that a beautiful woman has crash-landed on the planet. Take a look at this exciting new adventure, as Jack Harper goes searching for the truth about the decimation of the human race. Oblivion comes to theaters April 12th, 2013 and stars Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Olga Kurylenko, Andrea Riseborough, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Melissa Leo. The film is directed by Joseph Kosinski.Check out our network: - http://www.youtube.com/user/filmisnow- http://www.youtube.com/user/filmisnow2- http://www.youtube.com/user/filmisnoweu- http://www.youtube.com/user/filmisnowhd- http://www.youtube.com/user/filmisnowextra- http://www.youtube.com/user/sneakpeakandfake- http://www.youtube.com/user/retrotrailers- http://www.youtube.com/user/comingcoolFollow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/filmisnowNew movie trailers every day!"Oblivion" "Oblivion Trailer" "Oblivion Movie" "Oblivion HD" "Oblivion Film" "Oblivion International Trailer" "Tom Cruise" "Morgan Freeman" "Olga Kurylenko" "Andrea Riseborough" "Nikolaj Coster-Waldau" "Melissa Leo" "Joseph Kosinski" "Oblivion 2013" "worldcinemanews" "machinima" "coming soon"
